The Cornerstone Academy PTO (CAPTO) is an organization whose purpose is to strengthen, enhance and encourage the educational and social environment of Cornerstone Academy. Its goals are to complement the school curriculum with additional opportunities for parents, teachers and students to learn, socialize, communicate and grow.

As always, we appreciate you, especially as we go through this process together and look forward to having you join us!
